typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Allocation_percentage as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Fund,
		Asset_ID = Asset,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code = {GL Code}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Allocation_percent as decimal(18,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code
	)) ~> StagingDB
